key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including settlements and lawsuits
Dependence on federal contracts for revenue
Operational risks from faulty account transfers and credit reporting errors
Competition in the education technology sector
controversies: $1.8 million settlement with Massachusetts Attorney General for IDR plan communication failures
Lawsuits alleging miscalculation of monthly payments under the SAVE plan
Millions of credit reporting errors due to faulty account transfers
social_issues: Poor customer service and miscommunication with borrowers
Impact of credit reporting errors on borrowers' financial health
Scrutiny from advocacy groups and lawmakers over handling of student loan accounts
governance_issues: Ethical concerns over loan repayment transparency and customer service

sources.title: Discover lands servicer for student loan portfolio

sources.snippet: If Nelnet is your federal student loan servicer, believe it or not, you might have lucked out. sources.title: Nelnet Lawsuit Claims Student Loan Servicer Grossly Miscalculated ...
